remarks: A function is a Moore closure operator iff it satisfies ~ mrcssid , ~ mrcss , and ~ mrcidm .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ismrc $p |- ( F e. ( mrCls " ( Moore ` B ) ) <-> ( B e. _V /\ F : ~P B --> ~P B /\ A. x A. y ( ( x C_ B /\ y C_ x ) -> ( x C_ ( F ` x ) /\ ( F ` y ) C_ ( F ` x ) /\ ( F ` ( F ` x ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
